Package com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.model

Class Territory

java.lang.Object
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.utils.Observable
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.model.Territory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Territory extends Observable implements Serializable
This class contains all datastructures and utility functions to control the territory.
Author:
Jonas Pohl
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Territory()
    Creates a new Territory with a new robbi instance and initializes all tiles to the default size.

  • Constructor Details

    • Territory

      public Territory()
      Creates a new Territory with a new robbi instance and initializes all tiles to the default size.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public TerritoryState save()
      Saves the Territory in a TerritoryState in order to allow to restore it later.
      Returns:
      a Memento Object of the territory

    • restore

      public void restore(TerritoryState state)
      Restores the territory from a memento object.
      Parameters:
      state - the Memento object of the state the territory should restore to.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int x, int y)
      Calculates the tile for the given x and y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - tiles x ordinate
      y - tiles y ordinate
      Returns:
      the tile for the corresponding coordinate

    • getNumRows

      public int getNumRows()
      Getter for the current number of rows.
      Returns:
      the current number of rows

    • getNumCols

      public int getNumCols()
      Getter for the current number of columns.
      Returns:
      the current number of columns

    • hasSizeChanged

      public boolean hasSizeChanged()
      Getter to check if the size of the territory has changed.
      Returns:
      true if the size has changed, false otherwise

    • setSizeChanged

      public void setSizeChanged(boolean flag)
      Setter to update if the size has changed.
      Parameters:
      flag - new value for the sizeChanged attribute

    • setRobbi

      public void setRobbi(Robbi robbi)
      Setter to update Robbi in the territory.
      Parameters:
      robbi - the new Robbi for the territory

    • getRobbi

      public Robbi getRobbi()
      Getter for the current robbi in the territory.
      Returns:
      the current robbi

    • getRobbiDirection

      public DIRECTION getRobbiDirection()
      Getter for robbis current direction.
      Returns:
      robbis current direction

    • getRobbiItem

      public Item getRobbiItem()
      Getter for robbis current item.
      Returns:
      the item robbi is currently holding. null, if robbi does not have one.

    • robbiOnTile

      public boolean robbiOnTile(int col, int row)
      Checks if robbi is on the tile with the given coords.
      Parameters:
      col - the columns to check
      row - the row to check
      Returns:
      true if and only if robbi is on the tile provided by col and row, false otherwise

    • placeItem

      public boolean placeItem(Item item, int x, int y)
      Placing the given item in the territory at the given x-y-position.
      Parameters:
      item - the item to place in the territory
      x - x-ordinate in the territory
      y - y-ordinate in the territory
      Returns:
      true if the item has been placed in the territory, false otherwise

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(int x, int y)
      Getter for the item in the territory at the given position.
      Parameters:
      x - x-ordinate in the territory
      y - y-ordinate in the territory
      Returns:
      the item, which is placed at the given position

    • removeItem

      public Item removeItem(int x, int y)
      Removes the item from the given position.
      Parameters:
      x - x-ordinate in the territory
      y - y-ordinate in the territory
      Returns:
      the item that has been removed from the tile

    • update

      public void update(Territory territory, Item item, int x, int y, DIRECTION facing)
      Updates the territory to the given territory and updates robbi with the additional information.
      This method is used to update the territory to a territory state loaded from a file.
      Parameters:
      territory - the new territory
      item - the item robbi has in his bag
      x - robbis x position
      y - robbis y positions
      facing - robbis facing

    • changeSize

      public void changeSize(int newCols, int newRows)
      Updates the size of the territory to the new size.
      Parameters:
      newCols - new number of columns in the territory
      newRows - new number of rows in the territory

    • placeRobbi

      public void placeRobbi(int x, int y)
      move robbi to the given position.
      Parameters:
      x - robbis new x-position
      y - robbis new y-position

    • placeHollow

      public void placeHollow(int x, int y)
      Place a new Hollow at the given position if it is in bounds and robbi is not on the tile.
      Parameters:
      x - Hollows x-Position
      y - Hollows y-Position

    • placePileOfScrap

      y - PileOfScrap y-Position
